p: The flowering start date for Certo was 92.5 d after planting under ambient CO 2 conditions and 91 d after planting under elevated CO 2. Thus elevated CO 2 led to earlier flowering of Certo by 1.5 d ( P<0.0001). The flowering start date for HOSUT, under both ambient and elevated CO 2, was 90 d after planting, indicating that in contrast to Certo the high CO 2 treatment did not shift the start of flowering of HOSUT. Furthermore, HOSUT under ambient and elevated CO 2 started flowering 2.5 d and 1 d earlier than Certo, respectively ( P<0.0001).
